response.original_title: The Mask: Animated Series - The Mask is Always Greener on the Other Side
response.overview: When crazed inventor Pretorious discovers the potential of the Mask, he wants it for his own hidden agenda and sends his gigantic goon Walter to nab it from Stanley. Can Stanley - and the Mask - stop his evil plans?
response.title: The Mask: Animated Series - The Mask is Always Greener on the Other Side
